item.title: Disney and Universal Sue A.I. Firm Midjourney for Copyright Infringement
item.description: The suit, against Midjourney, is the first time major Hollywood companies have sued over A.I.-generated images.

item.title: CPI Shows U.S. Inflation Remains Muted as Tariff Impact Is Limited
item.description: The Consumer Price Index rose 2.4 percent in May, from a year earlier, a reading that reflects only the initial impact of President Trump’s tariffs.

item.title: Today’s Anti-Trump Demonstrators Carry a Political Burden
item.description: Today’s anti-ICE, pro-immigration demonstrators are dragging the burden of how politics worked under Joe Biden’s presidency.

item.title: Brian Wilson, Songwriter and Leader of the Beach Boys, Dies at 82
item.description: A hitmaker elevated and burdened by the label of genius, he transcended the breezy surf genre to create complex harmonies and intricate soundscapes in...

item.title: The 2028 Subtext of Newsom’s Speech
item.description: The California governor used a nationally televised address to criticize President Trump and to seize a political moment.
